document.full_text: manchester city set up a fa cup semifinal against fierce rival manchester united thanks to micah richards' second-half winner in a 1-0 victory over reading on sunday.
document.title: manchester rivals to meet in english fa cup
lines_and_colors: manchester city set up a fa cup semifinal against fierce rival manchester united thanks to micah richards' second-half winner in a 1-0 victory over reading on sunday.
